subject: Re: [junit] Multiple expected exceptions
msgSnippet: My guess is that the questioner has multiple operations in a single test: when I do *this* I get this exception and when I do *that* I get that exception If
messageBody:
My guess is that the questioner has multiple operations in a single test:

when I do *this*
I get this exception

and when I do *that*
I get that exception

If so, the answer is
break it into two separate tests.
else
I don't know

Kevin
